articles.title: Amid opt-out rumors, Sam Kennedy says Alex Bregman ‘wants to be here’ with Red Sox
articles.description:
"That’ll all take care of itself. He wants to be here, we want him to be here, and I’ll leave it at that."

The post Amid opt-out rumors, Sam Kennedy says Alex Bregman ‘wants to be here’ with Red Sox appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Sam Kennedy confirms Alex Bregman desires to stay with the Red Sox.
Bregman is rumored to have an opt-out clause in his contract.
This commitment could influence Red Sox's future roster decisions.
